name: Heaven Chaos
description:
HEAVEN CHAOS

Story: 

A demon from the depths of hell enters the Kingdom of Heaven. He wants to reach the top layer by passing through the gates of the 7-Storey Heavenly Kingdom. But guards are waiting at the gates of the kingdom. Will the demon be able to achieve his goal?

How to Play:

To open doors you have to kill people and find the soul pearls.

To Move : W,A,S,D

To Attack : Mouse Left Click

To Jump : Space

To Run : Shift

Team:

Erhan Çimen - Developer, Game Design

Cahit Akdeniz-   - 3D Artist / 3D Animator / Level Design/ Game Design

Ensar Kır- Game Music/Intro Outro

Ercan Çimen-  itchio Page Design

Ahmet Çolak - 3D Artist

Special Thanks : Harun  Ahıska 

Note: The free assets was not used. All drawings, modeling, animations were developed by the team. The game was developed for Mağara jam 5 in the last 36 hours. sfx are used from freesound.org
